messages: Oh good, you're awake. We have much to discuss. You can use LEFT CLICK to speed through my messages, as well as continue our conversation.
I've enlisted the help of a few friends to teach you everything you need to know to survive the upcoming battle.
To begin, let's head to the right. Use WASD to move and SPACEBAR to dash over that pit.
Your dash (SPACEBAR) can be used to travel through projectiles, and you can use LEFT CLICK to fire.
Nice work.  Let's practice with a few more friends.
Great job!  Ascend the staircase to the right and I'll show you around the graveyard.
Before I show you to survive the upcoming days, let me explain the situation a little more.
I've been waiting years for you to finally awaken.  I was able to bring you back to life using a bit of magic, but we have a problem.
Due to the nature of my magic, the nearby town was alerted and are sending people to kill you.  I know they are planning to erect pedestals to banish you away, and we must not let them.
If you can survive the next 3 days, my magic will become strong enough that they will be unable to banish you.
Alright.  Head to the teleporter in the center and I'll walk you through a simulation of how the humans will attempt to banish you.
